# WebDriver Manager changelog

## 1.3.1 (2016-10-19)

- **[FIXED]** Prevention of zombie processes, which affected termination of the
  standalone server ([#11], [#14] - thanks [@jails]).

[#14]: https://github.com/peridot-php/webdriver-manager/pull/14
